title: Scroll of cloning
data:
| ? [![Scroll.png](/images/8/8d/Scroll.png)](/wiki/File:Scroll.png) |                                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                              | cloning                                                       |
| Appearance                                                        | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Base price                                                        | 300 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight                                                            | 5                                                             |
| Ink to write                                                      | [15–29](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                    |
| Monster use                                                       | *Will not be used by monsters.*                               |

A **scroll of cloning** is a type of [scroll](/wiki/Scroll "Scroll") that appears in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM").

## Description

[Reading](/wiki/Read "Read") a scroll of cloning will prompt the player to select an item in their character's inventory, and creates a usually-identical clone of that item, with a cursed scroll producing a cloned item that is cursed and has less charges or [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment "Enchantment") than the original. Reading the scroll while [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused") has a chance of cloning the character instead, creating a monster corresponding to their current form[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) - this clone may not be tame, even if the game lists it as tame.

Even if the scroll is not cursed, certain items will not be perfectly cloned:[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

| original                                                                                 | clone                                                                                                                                                      |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Bell of Opening](/wiki/Bell_of_Opening "Bell of Opening")                               | [bell](/wiki/Bell "Bell")                                                                                                                                  |
| [Candelabrum of Invocation](/wiki/Candelabrum_of_Invocation "Candelabrum of Invocation") | [wax candle](/wiki/Wax_candle "Wax candle")                                                                                                                |
| [Amulet of Yendor](/wiki/Amulet_of_Yendor "Amulet of Yendor")                            | [Cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor](/wiki/Cheap_plastic_imitation_of_the_Amulet_of_Yendor "Cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor") |
| [Book of the Dead](/wiki/Book_of_the_Dead "Book of the Dead")                            | [spellbook of blank paper](/wiki/Spellbook_of_blank_paper "Spellbook of blank paper")                                                                      |
| [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact")                                                    | the artifact's [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") type                                                                                               |
| [wand of wishing](/wiki/Wand_of_wishing "Wand of wishing")                               | cancelled wand of wishing                                                                                                                                  |
| [magic marker](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker") with over 15 charges                   | magic marker with 15 charges                                                                                                                               |
| stackable items                                                                          | a single item                                                                                                                                              |

## Messages

- You have found a scroll of cloning!

  You read the scroll of cloning.

- You clone yourself!

  You read the scroll of cloning while confused. This does not guarantee the cloning succeeded.

- You realize that you have been a clone all along!

  As above, while [hallucinating](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/read.c#L2170>
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/read.c#L2173>

Scroll of cloning

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
?
Name cloning
Appearance random
Base price 300 zm
Weight 5
Ink to write 15–29
Monster use Will not be used by monsters.

A scroll of cloning is a type of scroll that appears in SpliceHack and Hack'EM.

Description

Reading a scroll of cloning will prompt the player to select an item in their character's inventory, and creates a usually-identical clone of that item, with a cursed scroll producing a cloned item that is cursed and has less charges or enchantment than the original. Reading the scroll while confused has a chance of cloning the character instead, creating a monster corresponding to their current form[1] - this clone may not be tame, even if the game lists it as tame.

Even if the scroll is not cursed, certain items will not be perfectly cloned:[2]

original clone
Bell of Opening bell
Candelabrum of Invocation wax candle
Amulet of Yendor Cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor
Book of the Dead spellbook of blank paper
artifact the artifact's base item type
wand of wishing cancelled wand of wishing
magic marker with over 15 charges magic marker with 15 charges
stackable items a single item

Messages

You have found a scroll of cloning!
You read the scroll of cloning.
You clone yourself!
You read the scroll of cloning while confused. This does not guarantee the cloning succeeded.
You realize that you have been a clone all along!
As above, while hallucinating.

References

  1. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/read.c#L2170
  2. ↑ https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/read.c#L2173

A '''scroll of cloning''' is a type of [[scroll]] that appears in [[SpliceHack]] and [[Hack'EM]].

==Description==
[[Read]]ing a scroll of cloning will prompt the player to select an item in their character's inventory, and creates a usually-identical clone of that item, with a cursed scroll producing a cloned item that is cursed and has less charges or [[enchantment]] than the original. Reading the scroll while [[confused]] has a chance of cloning the character instead, creating a monster corresponding to their current form<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/read.c#L2170</ref> - this clone may not be tame, even if the game lists it as tame.

Even if the scroll is not cursed, certain items will not be perfectly cloned:<ref>https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/read.c#L2173</ref>
